data.name: adidas Swim Slide Beyonce Ivy Park Ivy Heart
adidas Savage V4 Beyonce Ivy Park Ivy Heart
adidas Stan Smith Dipped Beyonce Ivy Park Ivy Heart
adidas Savage Beyonce Ivy Park Halls of Ivy
data.story: Dropping as part of the fifth collection with Beyoncé’s athleisure brand, the Ivy Park x adidas Savage V4 ‘Halls of Ivy’ brings back an archival trail shoe from 1999. The upper is crafted from white textile with wavy overlays in contrasting tan and black hues. Webbing three-stripes in Wild Pine adorn the quarter panel, while Ivy Park branding is embroidered on the heel overlay. The sneaker rides on a sculpted green foam midsole, supported underfoot by a lugged Traxion rubber outsole.

data.name: adidas Super Sleek Chunky Beyonce Ivy Park Halls of Ivy (W)
data.story: The Ivy Park x adidas Super Sleek Chunky ‘Halls of Ivy’ is taken from the fifth collaborative collection with the athleisure brand co-founded by Beyoncé. This fashion-forward take on the adidas Samba features an off-white corduroy upper with tonal leather three-stripes and grey premium suede overlays. Details include mismatched Ivy Park and adidas tongue tags, a navy leather-lined interior, and coiled bungee detailing at the heel. The low-profile design up top is offset by a chunky platform sole unit with segmented sidewalls.

data.name: adidas Super Sleek Boot Beyonce Ivy Park Halls of Ivy
data.story: Launching as part of the fifth collection with Beyoncé’s athleisure brand, the Ivy Park x adidas Super Sleek Boot ‘Halls of Ivy’ presents a sneaker-boot hybrid that draws inspiration from the classic Samba. A monochromatic olive green finish is applied to the upper, lined in warm Sherpa fleece and built with a blend of ballistic mesh and premium suede. Utilitarian details include D-ring eyelets and a coiled bungee strap that wraps around the high-cut collar. The towering silhouette is anchored by a gum rubber platform sole.

data.name: adidas Adizero Adios Pro 2 Legacy Indigo Turbo
data.story: The adidas Adizero Adios Pro 2 ‘Legacy Indigo Turbo’ showcases vibrant hues on a performance running shoe designed with direct input from world-class athletes. Made with 50% recycled content, the semi-translucent textile upper is rendered in a gradient blue finish with oversized three-stripes in a bright red hue. The cushioned midsole is composed of two layers of Lightstrike Pro foam, enhanced with a series of carbon-infused EnergyRods for limited energy loss. The outsole features grippy Continental Rubber under the forefoot and heel.

data.name: adidas Ultra Boost OG Beyonce Ivy Park Solar Green
data.story: Launching as part of the fifth collaborative collection with the athleisure brand co-founded by Beyoncé, the Ivy Park x adidas UltraBoost OG ‘Halls of Ivy’ treats the running shoe to a monochrome neon green makeover. Drawcord lacing secures the flexible Primeknit upper, bolstered with a molded midfoot cage and external heel counter. Dual adidas and Ivy Park branding decorates the sockliner. The sneaker sits atop a full-length Boost midsole, reinforced underfoot by a Stretchweb Continental rubber outsole.

data.name: adidas Ultra Boost OG Beyonce Ivy Park Peloton Focus Olive
data.story: The Ivy Park x Peloton x adidas UltraBoost OG ‘Focus Olive’ delivers a three-way collaboration that brings together the Three Stripes with Beyoncé’s athleisure brand and the popular exercise equipment manufacturer. The lightweight running shoe carries an olive green knit upper secured with toggle lace closure. ‘Ivy Park’ is debossed on the tonal heel counter, while the leather tongue tag displays dual adidas and Peloton branding. The sneaker rides atop a matching green Boost midsole, supported underfoot by a neon green Continental rubber outsole.

data.name: adidas Adizero Adios Pro 2 Halo Ivory Pink Solar Gold
adidas Solarthon Primegreen Grey Sonic Aqua
adidas Adizero Adios Pro 2 Black Silver Yellow Purple
adidas Ultra Boost 4.0 DNA Green Matte Gold
adidas Ultra Boost 20 James Bond 007 No Time Do Die Black
data.story: Drawn from a capsule collection inspired by the James Bond film ‘No Time to Die,’ the adidas UltraBoost 20 ‘Triple Black’ showcases a sleek monochromatic finish in a nod to the secret agent’s signature tuxedo. The black Primeknit upper is accented with unique branding elements, including ‘007’ inscribed on the heel and a familiar tongue-tag graphic that references the opening title sequence of every Bond film. Inside the tonal midfoot cage, a hidden pocket provides storage space for tiny spy gadgets. The lightweight runner rides on a matching black Boost midsole, underpinned by a grippy Continental rubber outsole.

data.name: adidas Ultra Boost DNA James Bond 007 No Time Do Die Off White
data.story: The adidas UltraBoost DNA ‘Triple White’ is taken from a capsule collection celebrating the release of the James Bond film ‘No Time to Die.’ This pair pays tribute to 007’s sartorial sensibilities, featuring a monochromatic palette inspired by Bond’s tuxedo. Off-white Primeknit is executed on the upper, accented with ‘007’ debossed on the heel and a tongue-tag graphic that nods to the iconic title sequence of all 25 Bond films. The sneaker is mounted on a full-length Boost midsole, supported by a Cloud White Continental rubber outsole and a black tie-inspired Torsion bar.

data.name: adidas Ultra Boost 20 James Bond 007 No Time Do Die Black Grey
adidas Adiozero Prime X Sonic Ink Green
data.story: The adidas Adizero Prime X ‘Sonic Ink Screaming Green’ features color-popped accents on a performance running shoe built for long distances. The semi-translucent upper is crafted from Celermesh 2.0, rendered in white and violet with a bright green Slinglaunch Heel for an anti-slip lockdown fit. Three layers of Lightstrike Pro foam are packed into the midsole, enhanced with five carbon-infused EnergyRods designed to spring back with each step. A Continental rubber outsole provides superior grip.

data.name: adidas Ultra Boost 1.0 DNA Core Black Oreo Toe
data.colorway: Core Black / Core Black / Cloud White

data.name: adidas Adizero XCS Tinman Elite
adidas Forum Mid Ivy Park Rodeo Halo Silver
data.story: Launching as part of a comprehensive collection with Beyoncé’s athleisure brand, the Ivy Park x adidas Forum Mid ‘Rodeo’ treats the retro hoops shoe to a neutral one-note finish. Toggle laces secure a grey canvas upper with raw edges and serrated suede three-stripes. Ivy Park branding is found on a rubberized insert on the adjustable strap, as well as a suede tongue tag marked with embroidered lettering in a subtle purple hue. The mid-top rides on a tonal rubber midsole, enhanced with EVA cushioning and reinforced by a semi-translucent rubber outsole.

data.name: adidas Ultra Boost OG Beyonce Ivy Park Navy
data.story: Similar to past UltraBoost collaborations with Beyoncé’s athleisure brand, the Ivy Park x adidas UltraBoost OG ‘Night Marine’ pairs refreshed details with a monochromatic palette. Varying shades of blue are applied to the sock-like Primeknit upper, secured with a toggle lacing system and fortified with a TPU midfoot cage. Atop the suede-covered heel counter, traditional UltraBoost branding is replaced by a debossed Ivy Park logo. The sneaker rides on a matching navy Boost midsole, supported underfoot by a Stretchweb Continental rubber outsole.

data.name: adidas Superstar Red Cloud White Gold
adidas Superstar Legend Ink Cloud White Gold
adidas Slides Ivy Park Screaming Orange
data.story: Designed in partnership with Beyoncé’s athleisure imprint, the Ivy Park x adidas Slide ‘Screaming Orange’ applies a vibrant monochromatic finish to a fashionable slip-on sandal made for poolside and beyond. Plush terry cloth is utilized on the wide bandage strap upper, marked with Ivy Park branding in oversized block letters. Step-in comfort is provided by a molded foam footbed, which sits atop an exaggerated rubber sole unit for a lifted look.

data.name: adidas Solarthon Primegreen Black Solar Gold
adidas Stan Smith Golf Primegreen ZOZO Championship Black
adidas Solarthon Primegreen Grey Pulse Yellow Blue
adidas Adizero Adios Pro 2 Sonic Ink Screaming Green
data.story: The adidas Adizero Adios Pro 2 ‘Sonic Ink Screaming Green’ adds fluorescent three-stripes to a performance runner designed with input from some of the world’s fastest athletes. Partially made with recycled polyester, the one-piece Celermesh 2.0 upper offers a blend of breathability and support. The lightweight build is mounted on a double-stacked Lightstrike Pro midsole with five carbon-infused EnergyRods for optimized running economy with limited energy loss. Underfoot, a Continental rubber outsole yields grippy traction.

data.name: adidas Adiozero Prime X White Solar Red
adidas Superstar White Ambient Sky Gold
adidas Superstar All Black
adidas Lette Slide Stella McCartney Core Black (W)
data.story: The Stella McCartney x adidas women’s Lette Slide ‘Core Black’ delivers the British fashion designer’s take on the post-workout sandal. Dual black straps — one in stretchy textile, the other in open mesh —deliver a supportive and comfortable fit. The contoured footbed and glossy EVA midsole are both stamped with adidas and Stella McCartney branding. Underfoot, the rubber outsole features a modified herringbone traction pattern for superior grip.

data.name: adidas Ozweego Vapour Steel
data.story: The adidas Ozweego ‘Vapour Steel’ delivers a monochrome edition of the lifestyle runner inspired by the Ozweego 3 from 1998. Like its namesake, the sneaker features a uniquely shaped eyestay and sculpted EVA midsole. A translucent support tube takes inspiration from the older shoe’s nylon lace loops. 3M reflective detailing traces the wavy lines of the eyestay and midfoot overlay, providing added visibility in low-light conditions.

data.name: adidas Superstar Core Black Cloud White Gold
data.story: In honor of its 50th anniversary, the Superstar ‘Core Black White’ treats the iconic adidas low-top to an essential color scheme. The instantly recognizable rubber shell toe is finished in black, as are the sneaker’s full-grain leather upper and lightly textured midsole. Contrasting pops of white appear on the serrated leather three-stripes and heel tab. The latter element is stamped with a metallic gold Trefoil, matching additional branding hits atop the tongue and quarter panel.
